summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Buku Kas and Mutasi Valas period navigation features. Backend APIs working perfectly, frontend mostly functional with minor navigation button visibility issue on Mutasi Valas page.

ui_bugs.issue: Previous/Next day navigation buttons (< and >) are not visible or clickable
ui_bugs.details: The ChevronLeft and ChevronRight buttons are present in DOM but not visible/clickable. 'Hari Ini' button works correctly.

passed_tests: Backend API /api/cashbook?period_date=YYYY-MM-DD - All periods tested successfully
Backend API /api/mutasi-valas/calculate?period_date=YYYY-MM-DD - All periods tested successfully
Buku Kas - Complete navigation functionality (←, →, Hari Ini buttons)
Buku Kas - Period date input and display
Buku Kas - Saldo Awal = Saldo Akhir calculation logic
Buku Kas - Summary cards display (Saldo Awal, Total Debit, Total Kredit, Saldo Akhir)
Buku Kas - Entries table with proper headers and data filtering
Buku Kas - Export functionality (Cetak, Excel, PDF buttons)
Buku Kas - Add Entry dialog functionality
Mutasi Valas - Period date input and display
Mutasi Valas - Period label display with correct date format
Mutasi Valas - Complete mutasi table with all currency data
Mutasi Valas - Summary cards (Transaksi Hari Ini, Total Pembelian, Total Penjualan, Laba/Rugi)
Mutasi Valas - Export functionality (Cetak, Excel, PDF buttons)
Mutasi Valas - Stock Awal = Stock Akhir calculation from previous day
All backend APIs returning correct status codes and data structure
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix navigation button visibility issue on Mutasi Valas page - the ChevronLeft and ChevronRight buttons are not visible/clickable, though they exist in DOM. Check CSS styling or z-index issues.
